channel.title: Pocket on ERIK.VAN.CRADDOCK
channel.description: Recent content in Pocket on ERIK.VAN.CRADDOCK

item.title: How I consume the Internet
item.description: I am an information junkie. I go from one obsession to the next. The Internet deals me out a constant supply of articles, images, music and video on any and every subject I can imagine. It is very easy to get sucked in. If I’m not careful I will find myself reading about some [obscure religious rite] (http://www.theapricity.com/forum/showthread.php?178939-8-Most-Bizarre-Religious-Rites) or the [mating habits of deep sea creatures] (http://news.nationalgeographic.com/2016/06/seahorse-reproduction-behavior-conservation/) or [Neuromancer fan fiction] (https://www.
